name: Quick Start – 2025-04-06 18:19
content:
# Quick Start Guide for EmberCore Mini UPS (Model: EC-MUPS-12V)

Welcome to your EmberCore Mini UPS! Follow the steps below to set up your device quickly and efficiently.

## What's in the Box
- 1x EmberCore Mini UPS unit
- 1x 12V/2A Power Adapter
- 3x DC barrel-to-barrel cables (30cm)
- User manual (English)

## Installation Steps
1. **Connect Your Device**
   - Use one of the supplied DC barrel-to-barrel cables to connect the DC output port of the UPS to your device (router, modem, etc.).

2. **Power Up the UPS**
   - Plug the 12V/2A power adapter into the UPS.
   - Connect the other end of the power adapter to a wall outlet.

3. **Check LED Indicators**
   - Observe the LED status indicators:
     - **Blue**: Charging
     - **Green**: Discharging
     - **Red**: Fault

4. **Device Protection**
   - Your device is now protected from power outages and will receive backup power as needed.

## Technical Specifications
- **Input**: 12V/2A
- **Output**: 12V/2A (per port, shared load)
- **Battery**: Li-Ion 8800mAh (32.56Wh)
- **Dimensions**: 120mm x 75mm x 30mm
- **Weight**: 310g
- **Operating Temperature**: 0°C to 45°C
- **Certification**: CE, RoHS

## Warnings
- Do not open or disassemble the unit.
- Keep away from water and high humidity.
- Only use the supplied power adapter.
- Do not expose to temperatures above 60°C.

## Support
- **Warranty**: 1 year limited
- **Website**: [www.embercore.tech/support](http://www.embercore.tech/support)
- **Email**: support@embercore.tech

For further assistance, please refer to the user manual or contact our support team. Enjoy your EmberCore Mini UPS!
